definition: a clutch (as on the rear wheel of a bicycle) that allows wheels to turn freely (as in coasting), coast in a vehicle using the freewheel
details:
noun
- a clutch (as on the rear wheel of a bicycle) that allows wheels to turn freely (as in coasting)
verb
- coast in a vehicle using the freewheel
- live unhurriedly, irresponsibly, or freely
= synonyms: drift
